title: Quantivate
description: Offering a comprehensive suite for governance, risk, and compliance (GRC) tailored to regulated industries, this platform excels in flexibility and integration, supporting functions from enterprise risk management to vendor due diligence.

title: RapidFire Tools
description: Offering automated IT risk management software, this business uniquely integrates network scanning, vulnerability management, and compliance tracking into a single platform for streamlined assessments and actionable reporting.
